dt: {bc}any of a subfamily (Erinaceinae) of Eurasian and African nocturnal insectivores that have both hair and spines which they present outwardly by rolling themselves up when threatened
{bc}any of several spiny mammals (such as a porcupine)
{bc}a military defensive obstacle (as of barbed wire)

shortdef: any of a subfamily (Erinaceinae) of Eurasian and African nocturnal insectivores that have both hair and spines which they present outwardly by rolling themselves up when threatened
any of several spiny mammals (such as a porcupine)
a military defensive obstacle (as of barbed wire)
